data.text: Saul in Pumi siamruoi ngai chungnga minchinasik khat-um thatnasik malungkha alaroon tit ah, Thiampu kaliankhet diang aleisi,
halli Pumi Lam kajui numeisa emakli pasal tuka-ang ka-intongpui inchu, inmani kha surra Jerusalemma hongruoinasik Damascus ah kaom synagogue mi ngai diang pesik cheii kha naperu tia aleini.
Halli Saul in damascus khuopuitiang aheinaipha, hintia asuokjei, jetlei-theileiya marwaanna inphut ra-ang inkhat in ama asir-apangnga awarjei.
Khawakhan ama nuoipilchungnga atajei halli “Saul, saul! nang in angsikme kei ninaminpoong?” iti rasa inkhat ama'n aleijet.
Halli ama'n ati, “Nang tu na-eme Pumi?”
“Takkha inthei-inlang khuopuikhan siro, halli nang in angtakme nathosik namindik inte.”
Halli amale inruoiya kasi mi ngai khan rasachu injetli mi inkhat-um inmumakpha, chongrilleiya in-ngirjei.
Halli Saul neipilla inphut hong-intheiya amit hongmakek pha, phur inkhat-um mumakjei, inmani'n amakha inkeiphiat ah Damascus inluutpui jei.
Ama nithum katung iteii leimumak, halli bak-inleiya aleiom.
Halli Damascus ah siamruoi araming Ananias inti inkhat aleiom, Pumi'n mangtalarra amadiang arilla, “Ananias!”
Pumi'n amadiang ati, “Inthei-inlang, Akatuun inti Lam khan siro, Judas inn khan Tarsus ah inphut araming Saul inti pa-kha jo-entokro, ajarchu, enro, ama Pathian diang aniya om,
halli araming Ananias intia inkoi mi inkhat hongluut ah ama'n amunasik akut achungnga iduongpisik kha mangtalarra aleimu.”
Ananias in amasangnga, “Pumi, hiwa mipa jarra, ama'n Jerusalemma nami ngaidiang angtuk kathamak ithokha mi angjet in kei diang inril kei'n kajetjei,
halli Damascus ah naraming kakoi ngaiseng kasur-kamansik ah thiampu kalian ngai diangnga inphut thomatorna ranakle inruoiya kijuo eii.”
Pumi'n amadiang ati, “Siro, ajarchu kei'n amakha kei sepa kathosik Zaatlop le Reng ngaidiang khat-um Israel mi ngaidiang karaming kaminjetsik ah kikadang ejei.
Ajarchu ama'n keisibit ah angtuk kapoong adeisikme tikha kei'n amadiang minmukate.”

Khawa jarra Ananias asiya inn khan aluut jei, halli akut kha achungnga aduongpiya ati, “Kasappui Saul,” nang in namu nasik khat-um Ratha Inthiang nasip nasik, “Pumi'n, tichu nang naheiwona lamma nangdiangnga inlar Jisu tak-in, keihi anaheitir.”
Khawalai-takkhan ngalip ka-ang lekkhat amit ah inphut ajuotajei, halli ama amunookjei, ama intheiya baptize athojei.
Ama'n bu abaksuo pha aranak ahongngarjei.
Khanna inphut ama'n synagogue rakip asiya Jisu hi, tichu Pathian Sapa eii tia karil aleiphutjei.

Takkha akajet rakip in inngak ah inlei-inkel, Jerusalemma Jisu raming kakoi ngai kathat mi kha emak abe? halli ama'n hiwa mi ngai surliya thiampu kalian ngaidiang ruoinasik jartak ah hinna ijuo emak abe?
Takkha Saul in ranak kaneiya chongkha arilla, hiwahi Christa Jisu kha eii ti aril mincheenpha, Damascus ah kaom Jihudi mi ngaikha masangdan leijetmujei.
Khawa suonuk nikhuo angjet thengsuo pha, Jihudi ngai'n ininchunna Saul kha thatnasik inminsuukjei, 2 Cor 11:32,33
takkha inmani'n inminsuuk chuon kha Saul in aleijet, halli inmani'n ama thatnasik ah suun li zaan rakip khuopui suongkuung khannum inleimaruongjei.
Takkha ama siamruoi ngaikhan zaanna, inruoiya kok inkhat suungnga inthunli amakha rapal kaangkhattiang inleimachumjei.
Saul in Jerusalemma aheiwapha, siamruoi ngaile inchunnasik aleingaidon, takkha ama siamruoi ejei ti ngamnamu ah inmani rakip in amakha inleichi.

Takkha Barnabas in amakha asanna tirton ngai koolla aruoiya, ama'n angtho-thoa lamma Pumi kha intongpui, Pumi le ama angtho-thoa in-inbiak, khat-um ama'n angtho-thoa Jisu ramingnga Damascus khan kangamtak ah chong iril, inmani diang inthiangnga arilpi jei.
Halli Saul in inmanile inruoiya Pumi ramingnga kangamtak ah Jerusalem khan inluut insuok ah chongkha inleiril.
Halli ama'n kangamtak ah Greek chongkaril Jihudi ngaikha alei-inbiakpui, takkha inmani'n amakha thatnasik inleitho.
Akangamna ngaikhan hiwa jarhi injetpha, Saul kha Caesarea tiang inruoiya, halli amakha Tarsus tiang inleitirjei.
Khawa jarra Judea, Galilee, khat-um Samaria rampumpuiya koisuok rakip kahoi-kadai leiminmumu, halli Ratha Inthiang in asan jarra Pumi kayana ringkhuo khan inringnga, khella inhongpungjei.
Peter in ram rakip khan aleisi, halli Lydda ah Pathian mi kaom ngaidiang khannum aphakhat akapha aleisi.
Halli khawa munkhan araming Aeneas inti, kum riat zaalmunna intheileiya kazaal, apum kaangkhat kathiya kana mi inkhat alei-intongpui.
Halli Peter in amadiang ati, “Aeneas,” “Jisu Christa in nang anamindamjei, inthei-inlang nazaalmun inbooltaro.” Halli khawa phatak khan ama intheijei.
Lydda khat-um Sharonna kaom mi rakip in amakha inmujei, halli inmani Pumi diangkhan inhei-inlet jei.

Joppa ah araming Tabitha, nimaletli Greek chongnga Dorcas9:36. Dorcas tinahi Greek chongnga sakhi tina eii. inti numeisa siamruoi inkhat aleiom; ama'n apha rakip chuonkatha atho khat-um sara ngai aleisan.
Khawapha khan numeisanu kha ana ah athi jei, halli inmani'n amakha tui-inminbuolla chung inn khan inminzaal jei.
Halli Joppa hi Lydda ah inphut kalaakthei emak jarra, Joppa ah kaom siamruoi ngai'n Peter kha Lydda ah om ti injetpha, keini diang innot ah naheiwapiro tia, miring inni inleitir.

Khawakhan Peter intheiya inmanile inheiwa jei. Ama'n aheitung pha, amakha chung inn tiang khan inruoijei, khawakhan chuulmei rakip in inchap ah Dorcas in inmanile inlei-omlaiya songkol khat-um puondiar ileikathui ngaikha inmalarra akoolla inleingir.

Takkha Peter in inmani rakip aminsuok ah, kemurkhup thep ah nina aleinei, halli apumtiang khan ahei-inlet ah ati, “Tabitha, intheiro!” khawa phakhan ama'n amit hongmakek jei, Peter kha amuwa intheiya ahong in-ongjei.
Halli Peter in akut ama-ouwa amakha akeitheijei. Khawakhan ama'n Pathian kangamna ngaile chuulmei ngaikha akoiya amakha aminringnga apejei.
Hiwa chonghi Joppa pumpui inthangnga, mi katamtak in Pumi kha in-inngamnajei.
Joppa khan Peter in nikhuo kasoottak sawun kanotpa araming Simon intipale aleiom.
